item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 9, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

18. Rollstack (YC W23) Is Hiring TypeScript Engineers (Remote US/CA) ( | hide)
19. All BART trains were stopped due to ‘computer networking problem’ (162 points | 130 comments)
20. Past, present, and future of Sorbet type syntax (97 points | 67 comments)

23. NSF faces shake-up as officials abolish its 37 divisions (416 points | 541 comments)
24. Why 536 was 'the worst year to be alive' (2018) (83 points | 33 comments)
25. Google Doc Templates for Startups (44 points | 6 comments)
